ygData.subject: Re: Psalm serious of spells and some updates to the song list
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This is *great* to know!  I d been wondering what the point was to this song since at L25 when I got it, Elemental Rhythms gave me 2 points more cold
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 13 Jul 1999, J.R. Hyde wrote:
> >Level 25: Psalm of Warmth
>
> Alright, ive yet to find out why nobody has posted any information about
> this song. In addition to cold based protection, it acts as a fireshield for
> everybody in the group. Everytime a monster hits you, they get damage done
> to them, at lvl 40 the damage is 6. Great song while fighting multiple
> monsters, and is in someways better than discord since it doesnt concentrate

This is *great* to know! I'd been wondering what the point
was to this song since at L25 when I got it, Elemental Rhythms
gave me 2 points more cold resist, and boosted my fire and
magic resist as well, with just 4 fewer AC.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
